PositionHistory.Title: Android Developer
Sr. Android Developer
Web Developer
iPhone Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
BeachBody [R&D Prototype] BeachBody is a Health application which hosts various workout programs to develop healthy and energetic body. The workout programs are downloaded from Server in archive format containing the videos, audios, text and plist (Apple format) files. Based on the configurations defined in the plist, the videos are synchronously played along with the audio files. Environment: * Android 2.1, Java 6, iPhone, Xcode, iOS Simulator, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Design & Development
Android Developer
MyBillTracker [R&D Prototype] MyBillTracker tracks all the Voice, Message and Data traffic usage and provides user with an estimated monthly bill based on the rate charges specified by the user. Environment: * Android 2.1, Java 6, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Design & Development of rapid prototype ; * Implemented continuous Monitoring of usage logs generated by kernel ; * Generation of monthly usage Graph
Android Developer Social Networking Client SNS Cloud Client is an Integrated Social Networking client application that helps end users to manage multiple Social Network accounts with ease of Restoration while switching to another handset. Huawei SNS Gateway supports Facebook, Twitter, Sina and Kaixin social networking sites. It has 3 core components: * 1) SNS Service * 1) SNS UI * 1) Home screen widgets SNS Service is an android based service which interacts with Huawei SNS Gateway using HTTPS protocol and exchanges the data in JSON format. SNS UI and Home screen widgets are the user interaction blocks which relies on SNS Service to retrieve the Social network updates. Environment: * Android 2.2, Java 6, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Design & Development of SNS Service which interacts with Huawei SNS Server to poll and pull content periodically ; * Lead a team of 4 members at client location ; * Implementation of RESTful API for content retrieval ; * Formation of content request in JSON Format * Parsing of JSON Content for UI presentation ;

PositionHistory.Title: Android Developer
BREW Developer
J2ME Developer
Game Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Cross-Platform Porting of Games from J2ME to BREW List of Games: * Andre Agassi Tennis * Shane Warne Cricket * BusinessMan * DragonFire * Bowling2 * CityRacer Environment: * J2ME, WTK 2.2, BREW SDK 1.1, VC 6.0 (IDE) Responsibilities: * Porting from J2ME to BREW platform and onto multiple Kyocera BREW Devices with varying form factors.
Game Developer J2ME to BREW Porting Library This Library has been developed to assist the Cross-Platform porting of J2ME games into BREW Platform. It provides Platform Abstraction Layer for all J2ME Low-level API's. Implementation of Custom Fonts is an added advantage to reduce the Text alignment & placement problems occurred while porting to various diversified devices. Environment: * J2ME, WTK 2.2, BREW SDK 1.1, VC 6.0 (IDE). Responsibilities: * Design and Development of UI wrappers to map J2ME Low level Graphics API with BREW Graphics APIs. ; * Implementation of J2ME Record Store into equivalent BREW Preferences ; * Implementation of J2ME File Access APIs into equivalent BREW File Access ;

PositionHistory.Title: Game Developer
PositionHistory.Description: J2ME Game Porting: Civilization3 Civilization is the Com2uS and ATARI joint venture. The game is similar to SimCity and Age of Empires. The Player has to create his own civilization by creating people, army, settlers, city, irrigation, constructions like roadways, dams, temples, market places and etc., The player can choose his tribe and number of opposition tribes. The game completes once the player tribe defeats all the opposition tribes in war. Environment: * J2ME, WTK 2.2, Eclipse Responsibilities: * Porting to various Nokia, Motorola, Sony Ericsson, LG, Sagem Devices ; * Build generation for group of devices based upon form factors ;

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: RTF 2 XML The concept is to develop a conversion tool to automate the process of converting Word (RTF) documents into their equivalent XML documents based on S.R.Nova Pvt. Ltd XML DTD. MS-Word is used for styling purpose and to save .doc documents as .rtf. Documentation styles help in identifying content blocks of the .rtf document. Environment: * `C', VC 6.0 (IDE), MS Word 2000. Responsibilities: * Design and Development of conversion utility to convert Microsoft Word Document into XML via RTF. ;

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: TEX 2 XML A conversion tool to automate the process of converting (La)TEX documents into their equivalent XML documents according to IOPP DTD. Environment: * `C', VC 6.0 (IDE) Responsibilities: * Design and Development of conversion utility to convert TeX documents into XML documents based on IOPP DTD ;

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Merge Tool The concept is to develop an automation tool (macros) to merge two XML documents, one in Dutch and another in French Language according to generic XML schema. This project includes 4 modules/macros: i) Compare ii) Merge iii) Embed iv) Third Language
- - - - this enables to merge, the output document
this compares the documents and report errors, if any. this compares and merges if not found any errors. this embeds sub files created for repetitive code. produced by second module with another language (English).

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
{{DOCUMENT_DATESTAMP}} 2013-8-21 {{END_DOCUMENT_DATESTAMP}}
Pradeep C Email: raj@sqldatasolutionsinc.com
(516)762-0153
Professional Summary:
* Over 9.5 years of Software Architecture, Design and Development experience ; * 8 years of extensive experience in Mobile Solutions spanned across multiple technologies (Android, iPhone, HTML5, J2ME, BREW, Blackberry) ; * Good expertise in designing Mobile applications and Mobile Web Portals ; * Architect for Celltop, an J2ME based extensible platform hosting mini applications called as Cells ; * Architect for MyVerizon, an BREW based Customer Care solution ; * Strong knowledge in Android, iPhone, HTML5, J2ME, Blackberry and BREW platforms ; * Lead team of 2 to 10 members over a span of 5 years across projects and technologies ; * Experience in preparing and reviewing SRS, PRD, High Level Design documentation and Approach Notes ; * Experience in preparing and reviewing Unit Test Plan, Requirements Traceability Matrix, Test Cases and Test Report ; * Involved in all phases of SDLC ranging from analysis, design, execution, production support, maintenance and operational support ; * Well versed with Agile methodology, acted as scrum master ; * Highly experienced in On-device debugging, various code debug and review tools like Klocworks, FindBugs, Lint etc. ; * Team player with strong work ethics, hard and smart working having excellent analytical and programming skills with commitment to excellence ; * Excellent oral and written communication skills, including interpersonal relationship building and ensuring synchronization and communication to cross-project interdependent stakeholders to deliver solutions that satisfy business needs
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS:
Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, Waterfall Programming Languages: core Java, C, C++ Mobile Technologies: Android, iPhone, Java ME, BlackBerry, BREW Web Technologies: HTML5, XHTML, Javascript, CSS, XSL, XML, JSP, JSON, RESTful Databases: Oracle, MySQ, MS SQL Server 2005/2008 Javascript Libraries: iScroll, wink, underscoreJS Tools: IntelliJ, Eclipse (IDE), Visual Studio (IDE) Configuration Tools: Git, Tortoise SVN, Tortoise CVS Bug Tracking Tools: JIRA, Bugzilla Operating Systems Used: Mac OS X, Windows7/2000/2003/2008, Unix/Linux
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Intel, Hillsboro, OR April 2013 - Till Date Android Developer PIM - Android Application An initiative of Intel R&D to create an Personal Assistant application which classifies the content based on Importance by collating all the user communication activities like, Call Logs, SMS/MMS, Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, YahooMail and LindedIn. Importance is devised through Natural Language Processing and user past interests over certain category of Information. Environment: * Android 4.2, Java 6, IntelliJ, Android devices, GIT Responsibilities: * Developed UI components using Android SDK for multiple screens ; * Implemented ``Pull to Refresh'' logic using custom List adapters to pull and load new content ; * Interaction with SQLite Database for data storage ; * Implemented Cursor Loaders to update UI immediately upon database changes ; * Implemented presentation of Yahoo Emails * Implementation of SMS Thread display ; * Implementation of Color Theme based on core color selected by user ; * Implementation of filters based on contacts, time, location and user defined labels ; * Added user defined labels to content ; * Parsing and Consuming JSON/XML web services ; * Integration of Content Ranker to analyze and assign weights to the content based on user passive and active feedbacks
Aricent, NJ, USA Nov 2012 to Mar 2013
Sr. Android Developer Navigational Map for Chemical Factory This application assists the chemical factory supervisors to view various Tasks, Gas Sensors, Surveillance Cameras located within the factory through 2D Map (bird view) and Panorama View. Spherical Mercator Projection has been used to locate the supervisor and objects. Supervisor can update the status of a Task, view the Gas readings from the various Gas Sensors via Bluetooth communication and view the live streaming from surveillance cameras. Supervisor can perform zoom & pan operations within the 2D Map and Panoramic View. Audio and Video VOIP calls can be placed to either another supervisor or to the Control Room.
Environment: * Android 4.0, Java 6, Eclipse Helios, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Architecture of client-server applications ; * Designed and Implemented localized 2D Map Views with multiple zoom levels ; * Designed and Implemented loading of 2D Map Tiles on-demand ; * Designed and Implemented multilevel caching mechanism to load 2D Map tiles ; * Defined the interaction protocol between client and Gas sensors
Turner Broadcasting Systems, Atlanta, USA Sep 2011 till Oct 2012 Web Developer Mobile Web Portal for CNNMoney (http://money.cnn.com/m/ ) Provides latest Stock updates along with Financial News and Magazine Articles. It enables users to create custom watchlist for desired stocks. This web portal is targeted for both feature phones and Smartphones. Feature phone portal uses plain XHTML MP along with CSS1 on the client and JSP, XSL, JSON on the server side. Smartphone portal is created as an HTML5 application along with CSS3, Javascript and underscoreJS. Banner Ads and Video pre-roll Ads have been integrated with Freewheel. Ericsson Drutt MSDP has been used to create the portal pages for feature phone portal. Environment: * HTML5, XHTML, XML, XSL, CSS1, CSS3, JavaScript, underscoreJS, JSP, Ericsson MSDP Responsibilities: * Contributed and Led offshore team of 3 members ; * Design and Development of feature phone web portal using JSP, XHTML, XML, XSL, CSS and Ericsson MSDP ; * Development of Smart phone web portal using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and underscoreJS for Android, iPhone and Blackberry devices ; * Performance Optimization at page load level and page rendering level ; * Implemented Markets and Watchlist ; * Implemented Local Storage to cache data along with content expiration ; * Integrated Freewheel Banner Ads as well as Video pre-roll Ads
Mobile Web Portal for Nascar (http://m.nascar.com ) Provides latest updates over Sprint Cup, Nationwide and Camping World Truck Series. This web portal is targeted for both feature phones and Smartphones. Feature phone portal uses plain XHTML MP along with CSS1 whereas smartphone portal uses XHTML, CSS3 and Javascript. Banner Ads have been integrated with Freewheel. Ericsson Drutt MSDP has been used to create the portal pages. Environment: * XHTML, XML, XSL, CSS1, CSS3, JavaScript, JSP, Ericsson MSDP Responsibilities: * Involved in upgradation of Nascar mobile portal for both feature phones and Smartphones ; * Lead a team of 2 members ; * Integration of Adactus Video services with Freewheel pre-roll advertisements ; * Support to multiple stakeholders involved at client location
Mobile Web Portals for TBS (http://m.tbs.com ), TNT (http://m.tnt.tv ) Provides Electronic Program Guide, Videos and User Notification Reminders via. Email for TBS, TNT Television Channels broadcasted in US region. These web portals are targeted for Smartphone browsers based on webkit technology. Wink toolkit, a javascript library has been used for flashy and user rich presentation. Banner Ads and Video pre-roll Ads have been integrated with Freewheel. Ericsson Drutt MSDP has been used to create the portal pages. Environment: * XHTML, XML, XSL, CSS3, JavaScript, JSP, wink library, Ericsson MSDP Responsibilities: * Derived the plan for Maintenance of TBS and TNT mobile portals ; * Integration of Freewheel Banner Advertisements ; * Implementation of Bango Analytics
Aricent, NJ, USA Jan 2011 till Aug 2011
Android and iPhone Developer BeachBody [R&D Prototype] BeachBody is a Health application which hosts various workout programs to develop healthy and energetic body. The workout programs are downloaded from Server in archive format containing the videos, audios, text and plist (Apple format) files. Based on the configurations defined in the plist, the videos are synchronously played along with the audio files. Environment: * Android 2.1, Java 6, iPhone, Xcode, iOS Simulator, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Design & Development

Environment: * Android 2.1, Java 6, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Design & Development of rapid prototype ; * Implemented continuous Monitoring of usage logs generated by kernel ; * Generation of monthly usage Graph
Android Developer Social Networking Client SNS Cloud Client is an Integrated Social Networking client application that helps end users to manage multiple Social Network accounts with ease of Restoration while switching to another handset. Huawei SNS Gateway supports Facebook, Twitter, Sina and Kaixin social networking sites. It has 3 core components: * 1) SNS Service * 1) SNS UI * 1) Home screen widgets SNS Service is an android based service which interacts with Huawei SNS Gateway using HTTPS protocol and exchanges the data in JSON format. SNS UI and Home screen widgets are the user interaction blocks which relies on SNS Service to retrieve the Social network updates. Environment: * Android 2.2, Java 6, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Design & Development of SNS Service which interacts with Huawei SNS Server to poll and pull content periodically ; * Lead a team of 4 members at client location ; * Implementation of RESTful API for content retrieval ; * Formation of content request in JSON Format * Parsing of JSON Content for UI presentation
Vodafone, UK Mar 2010 till Dec 2010
Android Developer TESLA Client - VF360 TESLA is an UI oriented application to enrich the User Experience around user contacts, social network contacts, social network activities and chat capabilities based on the VF360 Open source . It also provides Home screen widgets for Vodafone Music and Shop applications to purchase & download music content and applications. User contacts, Social Network contacts and Social Network activities are synchronized with VF360 backend server for anytime restore facility. Environment: * Android 2.2, Java 6, Eclipse 3.5, Android devices, SVN Responsibilities: * Involved in Discovery Phase * Lead a team of 5 members ; * Design & Development of Connected Contacts UI ; * High Level Design Documentation * Implementation of Custom Animations
Verizon Wireless, NJ, USA Nov 2009 till Feb 2010 BREW Developer MyVerizon Self Care Application (Framework - Pilot Project) My Verizon Self Care framework provides multiple customer care services to the end users. Using this application user(s) can check minutes and data usage, view account balance, make payments, view various user plans, add/remove features and change their voicemail passwords using their handset without reaching a customer care representative. Each service is developed using custom XML notation providing ample scope to extend the capabilities of the application without modifying or re-installing the framework. The framework uses its own rendering component which interprets the service XML documents and renders UI on the screen using BUIW. Environment: * BREW SDK 3.1.5, BREW UIW 2.0, VS2008 (IDE), XML, XSD. Responsibilities: * Architect for Client application ; * Definition Cell Grammer using XSD * Lead team of 5 members at client location ; * Implementation of Cell Renderer component which reads, validates, parses and renders UI and logic specified through XML documents
Aricent, TX, USA Sep 2006 till Oct 2009 J2ME Developer Celltop - On Device Portal Celltop provides an extensible platform for deploying mobile content, commerce and data services. It serves as a framework for Cells (mini applications), displaying and managing them in a form of mobile phone desktop. Celltop consists of the following five core modules * Font Library supports custom fonts to cover different Font Sizes, specifically to avoid various porting issues on different handsets across various OEMs. Supports changing font color dynamically. ; * Rainbow Effect provisions to end-users to personalize the look-and-feel of the application by selecting their favorite color and level of brightness. ; * XML Parser used to represent an XML document in its equivalent DOM Document. ; * Widget Library supports high-end UI elements and gives rich look-and-feel. ; * Cell Renderer parses, integrates and renders the XML based Cells in the Celltop environment. Environment: * J2ME, BlackBerry, WTK 2.4, Eclipse 3.2, XML, Java 1.5. Responsibilities: * Architect for Client Implementation * Lead team of 10 members ; * Defined XML Definition for Cell creation using DTD ; * Designed and Defined Celltop SDK for Cell Development which validates XML documents, collates Images/resources and generates Cell package. ; * Implementation of custom font library to overcome font problems across various form factors ; * Defined client-server interaction protocol ; * Optimized Memory and Performance to support vast range of devices starting from low end to high end devices ; * Achieved very low footprint to support devices with 64 KB JAR limitation and 512 KB runtime memory
Aricent, TX, BREW Developer Alltel Celltop - On Device Portal Celltop provides an extensible platform for deploying mobile content, commerce and data services. It serves as a framework for Cells (mini applications), displaying and managing them in a form of mobile phone desktop. Celltop consists of the following five core modules * Font Library supports custom fonts to cover different Font Sizes, specifically to avoid various porting issues on different handsets across various OEMs. Supports changing font color dynamically. ; * Rainbow Effect provisions to end-users to personalize the look-and-feel of the application by selecting their favorite color and level of brightness. ; * XML Parser used to represent an XML document in its equivalent DOM Document. Environment: * BREW 3.1.5, BREW UI Widgets, C Responsibilities: * Development of News & Weather Cells using TrigML ; * Defined Interactions with the application through Actors
Com2uS Corp, India Jun 2005 till Aug 2006 Game Developer Cross-Platform Porting of Games from J2ME to BREW List of Games: * Andre Agassi Tennis * Shane Warne Cricket * BusinessMan * DragonFire * Bowling2 * CityRacer Environment: * J2ME, WTK 2.2, BREW SDK 1.1, VC 6.0 (IDE) Responsibilities: * Porting from J2ME to BREW platform and onto multiple Kyocera BREW Devices with varying form factors.

Implementation of Custom Fonts is an added advantage to reduce the Text alignment & placement problems occurred while porting to various diversified devices. Responsibilities: * Design and Development of UI wrappers to map J2ME Low level Graphics API with BREW Graphics APIs. ; * Implementation of J2ME Record Store into equivalent BREW Preferences ; * Implementation of J2ME File Access APIs into equivalent BREW File Access

The Player has to create his own civilization by creating people, army, settlers, city, irrigation, constructions like roadways, dams, temples, market places and etc., The player can choose his tribe and number of opposition tribes. The game completes once the player tribe defeats all the opposition tribes in war. Environment: * J2ME, WTK 2.2, Eclipse Responsibilities: * Porting to various Nokia, Motorola, Sony Ericsson, LG, Sagem Devices ; * Build generation for group of devices based upon form factors

Ltd XML DTD. MS-Word is used for styling purpose and to save .doc documents as .rtf. Documentation styles help in identifying content blocks of the .rtf document. Environment: * `C', VC 6.0 (IDE) Responsibilities: * Design and Development of conversion utility to convert TeX documents into XML documents based on IOPP DTD
GUYOT, Belgium Feb 2004 till Mar 2004 Software Engineer Merge Tool The concept is to develop an automation tool (macros) to merge two XML documents, one in Dutch and another in French Language according to generic XML schema. - - - - this enables to merge, the output document
this compares the documents and report errors, if any. this compares and merges if not found any errors. this embeds sub files created for repetitive code. produced by second module with another language (English). Environment: * VBScript, Corel XMetal 4.0 (IDE) Responsibilities: * Design and Development ; * Integration of VBScript scripts with Xmetal IDE ; * Runtime validation of input XML documents ; * Implementation of logic to compare the hierarchy and sequence of elements ; * Optimization of XML documents by removing multiple blank spaces, conversion of empty XML tags into self closing tags
Educational Qualifications: * M.Sc., (Master of Science in Information Systems) from S.V. University, Tirupathi, ; * B.C.A. (Bachelor of Computer Applications) from S.V. University, Tirupathi, India in 2001.

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Pradeep C has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. Currently he is employed as an Android Developer at Intel. Pradeep has extensive knowledge of XML, Android, Java 2 Micro Edition, Cascading Style Sheets, JavaScript, Java, ECLiPSe, XSL, XHTML, HTML5, Java Server Pages, BlackBerry, Apache Subversion, iPhone, JSON, XML Schema, C Programming Language, WTK 2.4, IntelliJ IDEA, underscoreJS, Web Services, Nokia, Motorola Hardware, Microsoft Word 2000, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, Eclipse Helios, Client/Server, BlueTooth Technology, API. So far Pradeep has not gained any managerial experience.
